a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}x x x x x lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia a-ki ina {URU}ur-x x x x a-na-ku-ni ina UGU x x x x ša {1}ni-ia {1}hi-x x x x u₂-ṣa-bi-tu-u-ni x x x x a-mur-u₂-ni LUGAL x x x x u₂-sa-hir-u₂-ni x x x u₂-ma-a {1}ni-ia {1}hi-x x x u₂-sa-hi-ru-u₂-ni x x x x 01 me 30 ANŠE A.ŠA₃ x x x x-kal KUG.UD x x x x x ša {LU₂}kal-x x x x x u₂-tar-šu₂-nu ma-a x x x x a-ta-ba-ak x x x x x ma-a {1}u-ma-ak-sa-tar x x
